message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200. I think you'll find this a very good deal that you won't want to miss out on.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $160. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me at that price?
